titleStmt.title: A defence of the exposition of the doctrine of the Church of England against the exceptions of Monsieur de Meaux, late Bishop of Condom, and his vindicator : the contents are in the next leaf.
titleStmt.author: Wake, William, 1657-1737.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to William Wake. cf. NUC pre-1956.
